responses: Hello, thanks for visiting! If you want to know more about me, you can ask me about my education, job experience or hobbies!

patterns: Can you tell me your commands?
responses: Hi, I'm a friendly chatbot, you can ask me questions about my creator's education, job experience or hobbies!
See you later, thanks for visiting

patterns: What is the highest level of instruction?
What school did you go to?
responses: If you want to know about my education, try these keywords: Highschool, Undergraduate Degree, Master's Degree

patterns: What highschool did you go to?
Where did you study at school?
Tell me more about your school
responses: I went to highschool in the small city  of Catanzaro, southern Italy. The school is called Liceo Classico Galluppi, 'Classico' because we were taught Ancient Greek and Latin. The extracurricular activities I took part in during those years were the Math Olympics and Ancient Greek Theatre, I was also part of my school's football team and volunteered as a steward during the school's Book Festival Week. I graduated with a mark of 90/100. Here is the School's website: https://www.liceogalluppi.net

patterns: Where did you go to University?
At what university did you study??
What college did you go to?
Where did you get your Bachelor's Degree?
What year did you get your degree from the university?
responses: I got my Bachelor's Degree in Electrical, Electronics, and Communications Engineering from Geetanjali Institute of Technical Studies. I graduated with a First Class Degree (which is the top mark you can get!). During my time at Uni I worked on small engineering projects with my classmates. Here is my University's website! https://www.gits.ac.in/

patterns: Do you have a master's degree?
Where did you get your Master's Degree?
responses: After getting my bachelor degree I decided to complete my education with a Master of Science in Petroleum Engineering at the Imperial College in London. As if living and studying in London was not exciting enough, during my Master I had the chance to visit an oil platform in the Atlantic Ocean! Just like with my Bachelor Degree, I got a First Class mark

patterns: Did you do more than studying?
What is your most recent job?
Who is your most recent employer?
responses: I have a bit of experience, to check in detail every single job I've had, ask me using these keywords: Strategic Planning Intern, Production Supervisor, Data Scientist

patterns: Where did you do your internship?
Tell me about your first internship
responses: My first full time office experience was an internship at OMD. OMD is a media agency, a company that buys advertising space for huge companies such as McDonald's, EasyJet, Barilla, and so on. Since the advertising budget for such companies can be measured in the millions, the strategic choice of where to buy the advertising space must be taken without making errors. To ensure the best decisions the strategic team of which I was part studied the company, its competitors, its customers and what media they use most (Tv? Netflix? Social Media) and then adviced on where to invest and how much to invest to get the best results.

patterns: Where did you work as a production supervisor?
What was it like to be a production supervisor?
What brought you back to Indonesia?
responses: After my Master's degree I went back to my hometown of Sorong, to work as a production supervisor at an Oil Company, perfectly in line with my Master's Degree, where I designed and supervised the implentation of solutions for the Company.

patterns: Hod did you become a data scientist?
What do you want to do in the future?
responses: After deciding that the Data Science path was the right choice for my career, I joined Strive and took their bootcamp for AI and Data Science. By the end of it I was capable of building Machine Learning algorithms (Neural Networks included). I've started a job as a data scientist at the noble shoe company, where I use my capabilities to build model that handle big data and where I create dashboards so that the other departments have quick accesses to the needed insights
I like videogames, movies and tv series, books (mostly fiction) and animals!
